text: The 1990 UCI Track Cycling World Championships were the World Championship for track cycling. They took place in Maebashi, Japan in August 1990.Track Cycling World Championships 2014 to 1893 bikecult.com Fifteen events were contested, 12 for men (5 for professionals, 7 for amateurs) and 3 for women. ==Medal summary== {| |- bgcolor="#cccccc" | colspan=7 | Men's Professional Events |- |Men's sprint |Michael Hübner || Claudio Golinelli || Stephen Pate |- |Men's keirin http://www.cyclingarchives.com/ritfiche.php?ritid=5816 |Michael Hübner || Michel Vaarten || Claudio Golinelli |- |Men's points race |Laurent Biondi || Michael Marcussen || Danny Clark |- | |Viatcheslav Ekimov || Francis Moreau || Armand de Las Cuevas |- |Men's motor-paced |Walter Brugna || Peter Steiger || Danny Clark |- bgcolor="#cccccc" | colspan=7 | Men's Amateur Events |- |Men's sprint |Bill Huck || Curtis Harnett || Jens Fiedler |- | | Alexandre Kiritchenko || Martin Vinnicombe || Jens Glücklich |- |Men's points race |Stephen McGlede || Bruno Risi || Jan Bo Petersen |- | |Evgueni Berzin || Valery Baturo || Mike McCarthy |- |Men's team pursuit | Valeri Baturo Evgueni Berzin Dmitri Nelyubin Alexander Gontchenkov || Michael Glöckner Stefan Steinweg Erik Weispfennig Andreas Walzer || Brett Aitken Stephen Mcglede Darren Winter Mark Kingsland |- |Men's tandem | Gianluca Capitano Federico Paris || Norihira Inamura Masaru Saito || Uwe Butchmann Markus Nagel |- |Men's motor-paced |Roland Königshofer || David Solari || Andrea Bellati |- bgcolor="#cccccc" | colspan=7 | Women's Events |- |Women's sprint |Connie Paraskevin-Young |Renee Duprel |Rita Razmaite |- |Women's points race |Karen Holliday |Svetlana Samokhvalova |Kristel Werckx |- |Women's individual pursuit |Leontien van Moorsel |Madonna Harris |Barbara Ganz |} ==Medal table== ==References== Uci Track Cycling World Championships, 1990 Track cycling Category:UCI Track Cycling World Championships by year Category:International cycle races hosted by Japan
title: 1990 UCI Track Cycling World Championships
